snippet: The police say the traffic agent interfered when marshals tried to tow her S.U.V. for having more than $450 in unpaid tickets.
abstract: The police say the traffic agent interfered when marshals tried to tow her S.U.V. for having more than $450 in unpaid tickets.
lead_paragraph: Updated, 6:42 p.m. | A traffic agent who owed more than $450 in parking tickets was arrested Monday morning in Brooklyn, accused of trying to stop her S.U.V. from being towed, the authorities said.

headline.main: Traffic Agent With Unpaid Tickets Is Arrested Over Tow
